arts.ttl: The lowdown on Rotherham United 4 Charlton Athletic 2 - Unbeaten run ends in spectacular style
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic: Maynard-Brewer, Gillesphey, A Mitchell, Jones, Berry (Anderson 61), Coventry (A Campbell 84), Docherty (Kanu 83), Edwards, Small (Aneke 45), T Campbell, Leaburn (Godden 61). Miles Leaburn halved the deficit as he swept home from Greg Docherty’s cross in the final minute of normal time at the end of the first-period – but there was still time for Zak Jules to nod home after more haphazard defending in the Addicks’ penalty area.

arts.ttl: Nathan Jones after Charlton Athletic’s heavy defeat at Rotherham United: ‘We weren’t us today
arts.sum: Nathan Jones admitted he didn’t see his side’s chaotic defensive performance in the 4-2 defeat at Rotherham United coming. An error from Lloyd Jones then allowed Green to feed Alex MacDonald who doubled the lead from inside the area.

arts.ttl: Rotherham brush aside Charlton to continue flying start to year
arts.sum: Steve Evans’ men claimed a 4-2 win.

arts.ttl: Miles Leaburn keeping it in the family in Charlton Athletic's generation game
arts.sum: At 6ft 7in, Miles Leaburn has outgrown his father, Carl, who was a formidable presence on Charlton's front line for nearly 400 games - and his mother, Tracey, has been a guardian angel to a generation of Addicks players

arts.ttl: Number of clubs interested in loan deal for Charlton Athletic midfielder
arts.sum: Terry Taylor is being tracked by a number of clubs keen on a loan deal for the Charlton Athletic midfielder. Campbell signed at the start of this season on loan from Luton Town.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers face fresh competition in chase for Charlton Athletic fringe man
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers have been joined by Stevenage and Shrewsbury Town in the race for Charlton Athletic’s Terry Taylor,… The post Bolton Wanderers face fresh competition in chase for Charlton Athletic fringe man appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Rotherham United vs. Charlton Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Rotherham United and Charlton Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
